content: Our fourth quarter results were fueled by exceptional strength in North America, growing revenue by 425%, and key markets, including 700% growth in Israel, 185% in Spain, 133% in Belgium, 117% in France, and 76% in Italy, all on a year-over-year basis. For the fourth quarter 2022, revenue was â¬37.3 million, a 44% increase from the year-ago period, driven by volume, new products, and M&A, slightly offset by end of year pricing discounts. George, your line is open. George, your line is open.
